lyrics:
23 contributorsno gain lyricsintro
we started

be here forever

start here end up there

its never gonna be the same

nigga

verse 1
every day you wake up your destiny depends on what you do
sometimes i roll one when im stressed out and sometimes i roll two
here people sayin shit about the way i am but i know that aint true
at times i feel like im all by myself and i know you do too
i made some phone calls and checked emails cause im always grinding
aint no rush i do things slow cause its all about timing
some people think when you get to this point in life youve made it

and for those who ridin with me ima try to make it worth it

man i work hard goddamn shit
man i work hard what woah

no pain
